title: Sniper.Elite.V2-KaOs
description:
Release-Title:------------[ Sniper.Elite.V2-KaOs ]-             
                                                                  
  Language:-----------------[ English ]-                          
                                                                  
  Archive/Count/Volume:-----[ RAR 54x50MEG = 2.51GiB ]-           
                                                                  
  Release/Date:-------------[ 04-05-2012 ]-                       
                                                                  
  Ripped/Packed:------------[ KaOsKrew ]-                         
                                                                  
  Iso/Crack:----------------[ SKiDROW ]-                          
                                                                  
  Ripped/Removed:-----------[ Foreign Speech ]-                   
                                                                  
  Movie/Recode:-------------[ bik 50% ]-                          
                                                                  
  Audio/Recode:-------------[ Rebuild ]-                          
                                                                  
  Drivers/Extras:-----------[ DX, VcRedist ]-                     
                                                                  
  -------------------                                             
  INSTALL INFORMATION                                             
  -------------------                                             
                                                                  
  Step-1:-------[ UnRAR Yourself Or Use Our Install.exe ]-        
                                                                  
  Step-2:-------[ Run ~Unpack~.bat As Administrator               
                  To Unpack/Rebuild ]-                            
                ( Our Install.exe Does This Step For You )        
                                                                  
  Step-3:-------[ Click bin/SniperEliteV2.exe To Play ]-          
        :-------[ Located Were You Chose To Unrar The Game ]-     
                                                                  
                                                                  
  Time: Total Install Was About 45 Mins On A Quad-Core [ ]        
                                             Dual-Core [/]        
                                                                  
  Notes:                                                          
                                                                  
  Unless You Changed It The Default Extraction Folder Install.exe 
  Creates Is C:/Games/                                            
  This Is Were You Can Find The Games exe.                        
  If Install/Rebuild Seems To Freeze Leave It Alone.              
  Install/Rebuild Is Normally Very Time/Space Consuming.
